analysis: Market analysis indicates balanced conditions with no clear directional bias. RSI at 76.78 indicates overbought territory, suggesting caution for long positions. Money Flow Index at 67.88 suggests balanced volume distribution. MACD histogram positive with bullish crossover confirmed. Price extended above Bollinger upper band, reversal risk elevated. Price structure supports bullish continuation with MA and SAR confirmation. Ichimoku cloud analysis supports bullish bias. Stochastic at 87.95 warns of overbought exhaustion.
